content: I think I'll go with a monochromatic blue palette, as it's my niece's favorite color. I have a lot of blue fabrics in my stash, ranging from light sky blue to navy. I'll use a gradual transition from light to dark to create a sense of movement in the quilt. What's the best way to determine the width of the Chevron strips? Should I make them all the same width or vary them for visual interest?
